markdownRemark.html:
Deploying Website to Github Pages: https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/how-gatsby-works-with-github-pages/

installing github pages to gatsby

npm install gh-pages --save-dev

builds website to github page, for example: https://addania.github.io/

npm run deploy
